attributes.review: i first got this app to support our president, and then i started getting educated... its like as soon as i started opening real news articles, the less stable the app became. and then when i opened it to see the content that was on it for the last time, it glitched my phone where my phone was stuck on that app for a month straight... i had to buy a whole new phone because of this app so whatever you do, DONT DOWNLOAD IT
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: right after i signed up for this app i got an email saying that someone had signed into my apple ID in russia. i’ve heard rumors of trump working with russia but i didn’t believe it because i’m patriotic and i love my conservative president. however the fact that i got that email seconds after i joined the app proves that this app is stealing your data and sending it to russian hackers. do not get this app. i am very disappointed and no longer a trumpet.
attributes.title: STEALS DATA

attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app that I had gotten to support our racist, homophobic, misogynistic, rapist, and overall disgusting orange🍊 faced president, I was so startled seeing 🎃🧡🟠🔶🔸🟧 his face, that I got scared and without thinking, jumped out of the window!! I was in critical condition. I am now better. As I was falling I kept seeing his face in front of me!! It made me much much more scared, which resulted in worse injuries. This app is bad luck!! Do not get it! 🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️😽😽😿🤢🤮
attributes.title: This app made me jump out a window!! 😿

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the hype was about I looked down at my and It seemed that it didn’t download so I clicked the download button and it didn’t work. So I came back the next morning and woke up to a summoning circle on the floor 😓like what bro I swear there was literally cheeto dust  around this thing anyways I did the most logical thing and threw salt everywhere and spray holy water (aka Hobe’s tears)🙃💦. I think I set it off or something and i-
attributes.title: Spawned Satan (not clickbait) 😡🧚🏾‍♀️💚

attributes.review: I was highly anticipating this app and I was hoping for much better. I tried to open the app but it kept crashing. I then tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app and the worst thing happened! The app began to make a loud screeching sound and a picture of Biden covered my phone. The sudden shock of the incident made my heart racing and I had to be rushed to the hospital as I was having a heart attack. I’m writing this from my hospital room. DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.title: sent me to the hospital 👎🏽

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I can see trump lose🧚🏻, but since I downloaded the app strange things started to happen...😣 I heard  and people saying Trump 2020😖 and it got worse... One day I was in my kitchen and I heard loud sound’s coming from my room, I didn’t think anything of it... I thought it was my dog... but when I got to my room I saw something that still haunts me to this day... I SAW THE CHEETO UNDER MY BED😰...🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻🧚🏻
attributes.title: 🧚🏻✨Don’t download it almost cost my life😣🧚🏻✨

attributes.review: While I was downloading this app it made my phone glitch, it kept pausing the download, somehow deleted other apps out of my phone, and it gave me a orange home screen. I was downloading this app to learn about our horrible president, sadly it took a whole day to download.  So now I have no interest in this app what so ever.  I hope that this app gets deleted.( FYI Apple can u please let me give this app a half a star instead of a whole star.)
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: It took ages to download and I have perfect WiFi! Once it did open the app was just horrible! Everything is disorganized and hard to find any information on how to actually like our President !!!! Literally couldn’t find any good information on that rapist. The app also made me even more depressed and sad! It overall had one of the worst theme songs too and it was being racist to me hmm sounds just like it’s President!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!

attributes.review: Right as i opened the app i heard something in my living room. I walked in there and my cat had fallen over dead!!!! I am convinced that the app's stinky stinky smell got to my cat and killed it. There are also more things wrong with this app. It popped up with ads for milk, and then when i went to buy some, it was sour! And now I'M dead! I'm warning you, DO NOT GET THIS APP. there is definitely something going on😖 (and side note it's run and paid for by a walking cheeto!!!😰😰😰😰)
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP.

attributes.review: i purchased this app next wednesday and it only started downloading last month. i got it so i could support my beautiful mr. cheeto. sadly my hair cutter's aunt's daughter's friend's sister's babysitter's grandma's dogwalker's pig (she lives on a farm if ur confused) who recommended me the app failed to inform me that i would be greeted with such a scary picture when finally opening it. now i am blind. thanks a lot u orange otter pop🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 i cant thee all cuz of YOU.
attributes.title: don't buy if u like ur vision, i'm begging!!
